Hi! My name is Borja Aguado and this is my personal web page.  

In this website I intend to publish mainly the code of everything that I am doing on a daily basis. Whether it's research, teaching or my nerdy stuff. I love writting experiments using Python and Psychopy. Besides, I´m a data visualization nerd.  So, I will share code on how to make pretty and insightful plots.

----

My first paper *"Perceived speed of motion in depth modulates misjudgements of approaching trajectories consistently with a slow prior"* along with my awesome supervisor [Joan López-Moliner](http://www.ub.edu/viscagroup/joan/) was recently publish. If you want to have a look at it, don´t hesitate to click [here](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0042698919300756).
